title: Vedic Astrology Fundamentals

fundamentals.description: Vedic astrology (Jyotish) means 'science of light'. It reveals the karmic patterns written in the cosmic blueprint at birth.
fundamentals.purpose: To understand one's dharma, karma, and life path through celestial influences

pillars.1_Rashi: The 12 zodiac signs representing different energies
pillars.2_Graha: The 9 planets (including Rahu & Ketu) as karmic forces

fundamentals.description: The cosmic snapshot at the moment of birth, showing planetary positions in signs and houses
fundamentals.significance: This chart is the map of one's karma from past lives and potential in this life

fundamentals.description: The zodiac sign rising on the eastern horizon at birth
fundamentals.importance: The Lagna represents the self, physical body, and life's overall direction

core_teachings: The planets do not cause events; they indicate karmic patterns
Free will exists within the framework of karma
Jyotish is a tool for self-awareness, not fatalism
Remedies can mitigate negative karma and enhance positive karma
